channel.title: Need a little help adding skill capes

item.title: Need a little help adding skill capes
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Ok, so I changed the name of the team-36 skill cape to “Attack Skill Cape” in item.cfg, then I went to:

	public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

and added:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Attack Skill")) { return 99; }
But when I wield the cape on a guy with lvl 1 attack it still works…What else do I need to do??

NOTE:The reason I made the team cape a skill cape is because i’m using an old fashion mopar server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2009, 07:32:09 pm[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help adding skill capes
